snippet: Newly released court documents make it shockingly clear that Cardinal Timothy Dolan shielded millions of dollars from victims.
abstract: Editorial contends newly released court documents make it clear that Cardinal Timothy Dolan, while archbishop of Milwaukee, moved $57 million off archdiocesan books into cemetery trust fund in order to protect money from damage suits by victims of abuse by priests; says papers also show that while it took Vatican years to defrock embarrassing priests, it took mere days to authorize the transfer of $57 million.
lead_paragraph: Newly released court documents make it shockingly clear that Cardinal Timothy Dolan shielded millions of dollars from victims.

headline.main: Cardinal Dolan and the Sexual Abuse Scandal
headline.print_headline: Cardinal Dolan and the Sexual Abuse Scandal
